name: OX FIGHTER
description:
I wanted to make side shooter like GRA??US or R-T??E from childhood!

Features

-long ago 8bit style pixel art. you can select style mode on splash screen
one is MSX style color mode and another is monochrome mode like SPC-1000 or PC6001. (designed based on SPC-1000)
-mimic for classic side shooter.
-simple power-up.
-8+2 stages.
-8+1 bosses.
-3 levels of difficulty mode (NORMAL, HARD, STORY)
-support key control and mouse or touch control at a time.
(sorry, not support game pad yet)

Key Assign

splash
1 : color mode
2 : monochrome mode
(hidden)
3 : change window scale (1x->1.5x->2x rotation)
4 : toggle fullscreen or window mode
(※scale and full are applies when re-run application)

each menu
cursor key : select menu
space : run menu
esc : close menu or screen

in game
cursor key : move fighter
space : fire shot and bomb (rapid when press and hold)
F1 or esc : pause
B, N, M : change fighter's speed
L-ctrl : toggle auto rapid (no need holding space)

in pause
F1 : resume
F2 : abandon game
F3 : sound on / off
